articles.author: Arden Farhi, Pat Milton, Kathryn Krupnik, Nicole Sganga
articles.title: U.S., Europe investigating devices detonated at air DHL cargo hubs in U.K. and Germany - CBS News
articles.description: Officials are investigating whether the devices were part of a larger operation directed by Russia or outside individuals acting in the interests of Russia, a source said.
articles.content: U.S. and European law enforcement agencies are working together to investigate whether incendiary devices detonated in July at DHL logistics hubs in Germany and the U.K. were part of a larger operati… [+1893 chars]
